switchy.status.module.health.description: A module that switches player health.
switchy.status.module.health.enabled: You will have separate health per-preset.
switchy.status.module.health.disabled: You will share health across all presets.
switchy.status.module.health.warning: All health data saved on other profiles will be cleared!
switchy.status.module.hunger.description: A module that switches player hunger.
switchy.status.module.hunger.enabled: You will have separate hunger per-preset.
switchy.status.module.hunger.disabled: You will share hunger across all presets.
switchy.status.module.hunger.warning: All hunger data saved on other profiles will be cleared!
switchy.status.module.status_effects.des: A module that switches player status effects.
switchy.status.module.status_effects.ena: You will have separate status effects per-preset.
switchy.status.module.status_effects.dis: You will share status effects across all presets.
switchy.status.module.status_effects.war: All status effects saved on other profiles will be cleared!
